item.title: Show HN：遥控宜家死亡星光灯
item.description:
Repainting the iconic IKEA PS 2014 lamp into the Deathstar from Star Wars has been a popular IKEA hack for quite some time.This variant additionally replaces the manual, rope-operated mechanism to open and close the lamp with a remote-controlled motor.The firmware is based on ESPHome, and its excellent Home Assistant integration enables one to implement higher-level features, like a "sundial" where the死亡之星的光圈全天都遵循太阳海拔（请参阅时间段视频）。
评论url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=43809841 点：35 ＃评论：15
